item.title: Authentication via LDAP (Open-Source)
item.description:
LDAP Authentication

Out of the box Defect Dojo does not support LDAP authentication.

However, since Defect Dojo is built using Django, it isn’t too difficult to add support for LDAP. So long as you don’t mind building your own Docker images…

item.title: Performance Enhancements (Open Source)
item.description:
Filter String Matching Optimization

IN the UI, many of the filters for a given object will also query related objects for an easy visual match of an item to filter on. For instances with many objects, this could lead to a considerable performance hit. To alleviate this constriction, enable the “Filter String Matching Optimization” setting in the System Settings to change many filters to only search on names, rather than the objects themselves. This change will save many large queries, and will improve the performance of UI based interactions.
